synopsis.text: Gete Star, a colossal metal entity, looms over New Namek, threatening to consume the planet and its inhabitants. The Z-Fighters, led by Goku, are called upon by Dende, Earth's new guardian and a Namekian himself, to save his people from this impending doom. Upon arrival, they find the Namekians enslaved by an army of powerful Cyclopean Guards, commanded by a familiar foe - Cooler. Resurrected as a robot and equipped with advanced technology and regenerative powers, Cooler seeks revenge against Goku and his friends. With the stakes higher than ever, Goku and Vegeta, both Super Saiyans, must join forces to defeat Cooler and save New Namek from destruction. Will their combined strength be enough to overcome this formidable enemy and his mechanical army?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
